name: StarterMud

screenshots.caption: Server Running, Logged in with Mudlet.

short_description:
StarterMud is a port of Rom24B6 that is setup to be compiled on windows using MSVC. 

===========================
Update: 09-23-201
StarterMudv4 is the Latest Windows Build!
I compiled it with Visual C++ 6.0 as this is what I originally used during development.

- SVN now contains latest Windows StarterMud Files!
===========================

The Area Editor (SMArcead) for windows includes support for OLC w/mobprogs.. Works with All Win32 versions of StarterMud.

There is also a port of Rot1.4 and also include a cygwin version of Rom24B6 with olc, mobprogs and color. Various other Cygwin codebases can be found under the Files link. Most were used for testing code or were the start of personal builds.

 If you have any questions, email me anytime! cbunting99@gmail.com
